name: BigJerkInsultYourFriends
0:
”Alexa tell Big Jerk to insult Tiffany.”
”Alexa get an insult from Big Jerk.”
”Alexa ask Big Jerk to tell Kevin what he really thinks.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big jerk
des: Provide Big Jerk with the name of your friend (or enemy) and Alexa will provide you with an insult created specifically for your friend. Or just ask for an insult with no name, and Big Jerk will insult himself.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
